name: Time Tied
description:
Explore dungeons with the help of an ancient ancestor, linked to you through time itself. 

Controls: 

esc - menu

wasd - move

t - travel through time

space - interact with certain objects 

left click - attack (future only, if you have a weapon)

Credits: 

TheMoonestOne - Level Design and FX 

FreshBruedGames - Level Design and Programming
